xml:
Cyclo-progynova<tm tmtype="reg"/> 2mg tablets Indications and dose

Menopausal symptoms in women with a uterus

Osteoporosis prophylaxis in women with a uterus

By mouth

  • Adult

    1 tablet daily for 11 days, white tablet to be taken; start on day 5 of menstruation (or at any time if cycles have ceased or are infrequent), then 1 tablet daily for 10 days, brown tablet to be taken, followed by a 7-day tablet free interval.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
